results.summary: The agent report is excellent, closely matching the human expert report with accurate identification of root causes, causal chains, and metrics. Some historical fixes could be more directly relevant.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the CPU Manager (CM) as the root cause and captured the concept of frequency throttling.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain from CM to CPU to DDR to VCORE is well captured, including the SW_REQ2 voting mechanism.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent report accurately identified the key metrics such as VCORE and DDR percentages and CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical, though some historical fixes may not be directly relevant.

results.summary: The agent report closely matches the human expert report with minor omissions in causal chain details and specific metrics. Overall, it provides a comprehensive analysis with logical reasoning and relevant actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM and PowerHal as root causes and captured the concept of frequency throttling.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the main causal links but did not explicitly mention the full CM → CPU → DDR → VCORE chain.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately reported the VCORE and DDR percentages but did not mention specific CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical and correctly ruled out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes were relevant but could have been more specific.

results.summary: The agent report is very good, accurately identifying most root causes and metrics, with minor omissions in causal chain and reasoning.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM and PowerHal as root causes but did not mention MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain was well captured, including CM, CPU, DDR, and VCORE, but SW_REQ2 was not mentioned.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: All relevant metrics were correctly identified, including VCORE and DDR percentages and CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical and coherent, but MMDVFS was not explicitly ruled out.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes were relevant but could have been more specific to the identified issues.
